characters.name: Omnath, Locus of Creation
characters.description:
When Omnath enters, draw a card.
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, you gain 4 life if this is the first time this ability has resolved this turn. If it's the second time, add {R}{G}{W}{U}. If it's the third time, Omnath deals 4 damage to each opponent and each planeswalker you don't control.
characters.cardEffect:

characters.name: Iona, Shield of Emeria
characters.description: No more shall the righteous cower before evil.
characters.cardEffect:
Flying
As Iona enters, choose a color.
Your opponents can't cast spells of the chosen color.
characters.loreDescription: 에메리아의 수호천사. 고대의 봉인을 지키는 강력한 천사로, 특정 마법의 색을 완전히 차단하는 힘을 지녔다. 그녀가 하늘에 나타나면 그 색의 모든 마법이 침묵한다.
characters.flavorText: No more shall the righteous cower before evil.

characters.name: Kalitas, Bloodchief of Ghet
characters.description: {B}{B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature. If that creature dies this way, create a black Vampire creature token. Its power is equal to that creature's power and its toughness is equal to that creature's toughness.
characters.cardEffect: {B}{B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature. If that creature dies this way, create a black Vampire creature token. Its power is equal to that creature's power and its toughness is equal to that creature's toughness.
characters.loreDescription: 구울 드라즈의 어둠에서 태어난 뱀파이어. 피로 힘을 얻는다.

characters.name: Lorthos, the Tidemaker
characters.description: When Lorthos emerges from his deepwater realm, the tides bow to his will and the coastline cowers in his presence.
characters.cardEffect: Whenever Lorthos attacks, you may pay {8}. If you do, tap up to eight target permanents. Those permanents don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps.
characters.loreDescription: 조류를 지배하는 거대 문어. 타지임 심해에서 잠들어 있다가 깨어나면 바다 전체가 그의 의지에 따라 움직인다. 여덟 개의 촉수로 적의 모든 것을 묶어버린다.
characters.flavorText: When Lorthos emerges from his deepwater realm, the tides bow to his will and the coastline cowers in his presence.

characters.name: Nissa Revane
characters.description:
+1: Search your library for a card named Nissa's Chosen, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
+1: You gain 2 life for each Elf you control.
−7: Search your library for any number of Elf creature cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

characters.description: His spark lost, he plots revenge upon the plane whose corrupting mana fractured his soul.

characters.flavorText: His spark lost, he plots revenge upon the plane whose corrupting mana fractured his soul.

characters.name: Sorin Markov
characters.description:
+2: Sorin Markov deals 2 damage to any target and you gain 2 life.
−3: Target opponent's life total becomes 10.
−7: You control target player during that player's next turn.

characters.name: Armament Master

characters.flavorText: "We prepare for the known with daggers, rations, rope, and pitons. But we also prepare for the unknown with billycat tails, pikku roots, hedron chips . . ."

characters.name: Bala Ged Thief
characters.description: Whenever this creature or another Ally you control enters, target player reveals a number of cards from their hand equal to the number of Allies you control. You choose one of them. That player discards that card.
characters.cardEffect: Whenever this creature or another Ally you control enters, target player reveals a number of cards from their hand equal to the number of Allies you control. You choose one of them. That player discards that card.

characters.name: Bloodghast
characters.description: Summoning it is easy. Controlling it is another matter.

This creature can't block.
This creature has haste as long as an opponent has 10 or less life.

characters.flavorText: Summoning it is easy. Controlling it is another matter.

characters.name: Cosi's Trickster
characters.description: She watches the chaos created by the Roil, seeking strength in the patterns of anarchy.

characters.loreDescription: 코시의 협잡꾼. 로완 현상의 혼돈을 즐기는 머포크. 상대가 서고를 섞을 때마다 혼란 속에서 힘을 얻어 강해진다.
characters.flavorText: She watches the chaos created by the Roil, seeking strength in the patterns of anarchy.

characters.name: Devout Lightcaster
characters.description:
"Goddess, grant us light to banish the world's shadows."
—Prayer to Kamsa
characters.cardEffect:
Protection from black
When this creature enters, exile target black permanent.
characters.loreDescription: 경건한 빛의 시전자. 에메리아 여신에게 기도하는 코르 성직자. 특히 어둠의 세력에 강하며, 흑마법을 추방하는 신성한 힘을 지녔다.
characters.flavorText:
"Goddess, grant us light to banish the world's shadows."
—Prayer to Kamsa

Flying

characters.flavorText: When the earth shudders, the sky overflows.

characters.name: Felidar Sovereign

characters.flavorText: It surveys the withering landscape, waiting for a victory only it can see.

Haste

characters.flavorText: "I've been all over this world. I even remember some of those places."

Flying

characters.flavorText: Hanging on the walls of his lair, the fallen halos cast his depravity in everlasting light.

Flying
